author: Staff Reporter
text: Members of CPI (M), CPI, VCK and MDMK that constitute People Welfare Front staged a demonstration in the city on Tuesday evening. They condemned the “atrocities” that happened at the Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) in Delhi. CPI district secretary M. Subramanian said that the “false case” registered against student’s union president Kanhaiya Kumar was unfortunate. The parties also blamed BJP and RSS for the incidents at JNU.
title: Demonstration staged
